text: @AngelaRayner Why has no one asked the question. If Dominic Cummings is so vital to the premiership of Boris Johnson then why was he and his wife not tested for the virus? Or was he lying from the beginning about ever having COVID19? Someone of his influence surely could have got a test. No?
